config.vanilla-outsider-keep-gear.title: 1.21.11 Integration Config
config.vanilla-outsider-keep-gear.keepTr: If enabled, Trinkets with durability (or whitelisted) are kept on death
config.vanilla-outsider-keep-gear.useEch: Consumes 1 Echo Shard on death to negate the durability penalty
config.vanilla-outsider-keep-gear.enchan: If enabled, higher level enchantments increase the durability penalty
Additional penalty percentage per total enchantment levels
